thread.title: Veteran guard Deron Williams to sign with Cleveland Cavaliers
thread.title_full: Veteran guard Deron Williams to sign with Cleveland Cavaliers

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Veteran guard Deron Williams to sign with Cleveland Cavaliers
text:
Veteran guard Deron Williams to sign with Cleveland Cavaliers Williams was recently waived by the Dallas Mavericks. Post to Facebook Veteran guard Deron Williams to sign with Cleveland Cavaliers Williams was recently waived by the Dallas Mavericks.  //usat.ly/2lHrb4I   Join the Nation's Conversation   Veteran guard Deron Williams to sign with Cleveland Cavaliers Jeff Zillgitt , USA TODAY Sports 5:21 p.m. ET Feb. 25, 2017 Dallas Mavericks guard Deron Williams (8) drives the ball around Miami Heat guard Goran Dragic (7) during the first half at American Airlines Arena. (Photo: Jasen Vinlove-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Now that he has cleared waivers, guard Deron Williams has told the Cleveland Cavaliers he will sign with the team for the remainder of the season, a person with direct knowledge of the situation told USA TODAY Sports. 
The person requested anonymity because he was not authorized to speak publicly until the deal is official. 
The Cavs have had interest in Williams but could not absorb his salary in trade without trading a player they wanted to keep. Following Thursday’s trade deadline, the Mavericks waived Williams, and he cleared waivers on Saturday. 
All-Star forward LeBron James earlier in the season stated his desire to add another player – both for depth and to give James and All-Star guard Kyrie Irving a break from playmaking duties.
